2+1.sig_info: At the end of the fight, Ægon adds 10 to 65% of his final Combo Meter into his Persistent Combo, up to 999 hits total. Ægon's abilities that count the Combo Meter add his Persistent Combo on top of it.

PASSIVE: Base Critical Rating is 0. Critical Rating is increased by +24.37 for each hit of the Combo Meter.
Any Critical Rating Ægon would receive from a source other than his Combo Meter is converted directly into Critical Damage Rating.
PASSIVE - COMBO METER ABILITIES: Ægon unlocks additional Passive Abilities as his Combo Meter increases.
5 Hits - Critical Hits have a 40% chance to Purify one Debuff.
10 Hits - Critical Damage Rating is increased by +9.66 for each hit of the Combo Meter.
20 Hits - When the Opponent Evades, Ægon activates a Combo Shield for 5 second(s) and has a 45% chance to become Unstoppable for 2 second(s).
30 Hits - Ægon can strike with Critical Hits even while the Opponent is Blocking.
50 Hits - Charging a Heavy Attack grants Ægon 1 second(s) of Unstoppable. Cannot be activated while his Heavy Attack ability is on cooldown.
75 Hits - Opponents have -85% Block Proficiency when Ægon strikes with a Critical Hit
100 Hits - Critical Hits have a 100% chance to Purify one Debuff.
150 Hits - Critical Hits grant a True Accuracy Buff for 0.75 seconds. This stacks up to 3 times.
200 Hits - Critical Hits ignore 100% of the Opponent's Physical Resistance.
300 Hits - Critical Hits grant a Fury Buff, increasing Attack by +19 for 1 second(s). This stacks up to 3 times.
500 Hits - Critical Hits cause Opponents to suffer -100% reduced Defensive Ability Accuracy for Ægon's next hit
750 Hits - Critical Hits grant 1.50 seconds of Unstoppable and Combo Shield. This stacks up to 3 times.
1000 Hits - Critical Hits cause Ægon's next Hit to be Unblockable
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Ægon activates Combo Shield, and cannot lose more than 5% of his maximum Health from a single Hit, other than Special Attacks, for 6 seconds.
Once this ability expires, it goes into cooldown and cannot be reactivated for 15 second(s).
Landing a Heavy Attack reduces the cooldown of this ability by 3 second(s).
WHEN ATTACKED: 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 6 seconds, granting +47.5 Attack.
Gain 1 additional Fury Buff for every 50 hits on the Combo Meter, then refresh those Buffs. Ægon can have up to 6 Fury Buffs total.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict Bleed over 6 seconds, dealing 9.5 direct damage for each hit of the Combo Meter, up to 60 hits.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to Stun the Opponent for 1 second(s). The duration of the Stun increases by 0.10 second(s) for each hit of the Combo Meter, up to 7 second(s) total.

150 Hits - Critical Hits grant a True Accuracy Buff for 0.75 seconds. This stacks up to 3 times.
200 Hits - Critical Hits ignore 100% of the Opponent's Physical Resistance.
300 Hits - Critical Hits grant a Fury Buff, increasing Attack by +202.4 for 1 second(s). This stacks up to 3 times.
500 Hits - Critical Hits cause Opponents to suffer -100% reduced Defensive Ability Accuracy for Ægon's next hit
750 Hits - Critical Hits grant 1.50 seconds of Unstoppable and Combo Shield. This stacks up to 3 times.
1000 Hits - Critical Hits cause Ægon's next Hit to be Unblockable
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Ægon activates Combo Shield, and cannot lose more than 5% of his maximum Health from a single Hit, other than Special Attacks, for 6 seconds.
Once this ability expires, it goes into cooldown and cannot be reactivated for 15 second(s).
Landing a Heavy Attack reduces the cooldown of this ability by 3 second(s).
WHEN ATTACKED: 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 6 seconds, granting +506 Attack.
Gain 1 additional Fury Buff for every 50 hits on the Combo Meter, then refresh those Buffs. Ægon can have up to 6 Fury Buffs total.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict Bleed over 6 seconds, dealing 101.2 direct damage for each hit of the Combo Meter, up to 60 hits.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to Stun the Opponent for 1 second(s). The duration of the Stun increases by 0.10 second(s) for each hit of the Combo Meter, up to 7 second(s) total.

Gain 1 additional Fury Buff for every 50 hits on the Combo Meter, then refresh those Buffs. Ægon can have up to 6 Fury Buffs total.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict Bleed over 6 seconds, dealing 399.2 direct damage for each hit of the Combo Meter, up to 60 hits.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to Stun the Opponent for 1 second(s). The duration of the Stun increases by 0.10 second(s) for each hit of the Combo Meter, up to 7 second(s) total.

PASSIVE: Base Critical Rating is 0. Critical Rating is increased by +23.6 for each hit of the Combo Meter.
Any Critical Rating Ægon would receive from a source other than his Combo Meter is converted directly into Critical Damage Rating.
PASSIVE - COMBO METER ABILITIES: Ægon unlocks additional Passive Abilities as his Combo Meter increases.
5 Hits - Critical Hits have a 40% chance to Purify one Debuff.
10 Hits - Critical Damage Rating is increased by +9.36 for each hit of the Combo Meter.
20 Hits - When the Opponent Evades, Ægon activates a Combo Shield for 5 second(s) and has a 45% chance to become Unstoppable for 2 second(s).
30 Hits - Ægon can strike with Critical Hits even while the Opponent is Blocking.
50 Hits - Charging a Heavy Attack grants Ægon 1 second(s) of Unstoppable. Cannot be activated while his Heavy Attack ability is on cooldown.
75 Hits - Opponents have -85% Block Proficiency when Ægon strikes with a Critical Hit
100 Hits - Critical Hits have a 100% chance to Purify one Debuff.
150 Hits - Critical Hits grant a True Accuracy Buff for 0.75 seconds. This stacks up to 3 times.
200 Hits - Critical Hits ignore 100% of the Opponent's Physical Resistance.
300 Hits - Critical Hits grant a Fury Buff, increasing Attack by +15 for 1 second(s). This stacks up to 3 times.
500 Hits - Critical Hits cause Opponents to suffer -100% reduced Defensive Ability Accuracy for Ægon's next hit
750 Hits - Critical Hits grant 1.50 seconds of Unstoppable and Combo Shield. This stacks up to 3 times.
1000 Hits - Critical Hits cause Ægon's next Hit to be Unblockable
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Ægon activates Combo Shield, and cannot lose more than 5% of his maximum Health from a single Hit, other than Special Attacks, for 6 seconds.
Once this ability expires, it goes into cooldown and cannot be reactivated for 15 second(s).
